nodes.text: The Sword of Ieldis was the flagship of the Sith Lord Odion during his campaign against his brother Daiman. The vessel shared its name a Sith artifact of the same name—the Sword of Ieldis—the Sith sword of the Sith Lord Ieldis, of the first Sith Empire.

Odion used the vessel to lead a defense of his mobile manufacturing space station, The Spike. The crew of the Sword of Ieldis was composed entirely of fanatical Odionite Givin under the leadership of Jelcho.
